## Credit
This Extension made by [TerrierDarts](https://www.twitch.tv/TerrierDarts)

## Description

Heist are fun way to get your viewers to risk there points in a joint effort to win more, even if the mission is sucessful not all viewers will come back with rewards. With several levels of customisation this will add a whole new level of risk to your streams.

